channel.title: Pages on Vidyasagar Bhargava

item.title: about me
item.description: I work at Wipro Technologies as Technical Lead for Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence.Previously I worked with major Indian E-commerce companies like Snapdeal and Shopclues.I solved various business problems in the domain of Ecommerce, Retail with focus on Pricing Strategy.I built price optimization engine for automated pricing of Products sold on websites.I also involved in improving Net Promoter Score of Major multinational information technology company headquartered in Palo Alto, california.
